title: Charlemagne: holy barbarian
creator_credit: Victor Vicas, Learning Corporation of America and International Film Associates
brief_description: The story of Charlemagne’s campaign against the Saxons. Focuses on one campaign waged by Charlemagne against the Saxons in 782, in order to examine whether brutality in the name of civilisation is justified. Discusses the cultural contribution of Charlemagne, and shows the ruthless means he employed to accomplish his goals.
